covid_news_handling module¶

covid_news_handling.news_API_request(covid_terms='Covid COVID-19 coronavirus')¶

Requests news data from newsapi.org to be displayed on the webpage in the flaskapp Arguements: covid_terms {str} - A string of relevant keywords which act as keywords to filter news articles Returns: A list of dictionaries containing relevant article information

covid_news_handling.update_news(update_name='default') → tuple[sched.Event, str]¶

Schedules updates to news data Arguements: update_interval {float} – The time at which the update will be executed

update_name {str} – The name of the update.

Returns: event {Event} -> The event scheduled by the function
